name: Marvel VS Capcom 2 Revolution
description:
IN 2000, MARVEL VS CAPCOM 2 IS OUT. AND NOW... HERE'S THE 4TH REINSTALLMENT!!

---Disclaimer---

This is an old and unreleased fighting fangame I found on my old HP Windows 7 computer. The game is made using Scratch 2, so you might randomly run into many bugs and glitches throughout the gameplay.

---Menu Controls---

.Arrow Keys -----------Highlight selection

.Space ----------------Choose

---Battle Controls---

.Arrow Keys -----------Move

.Z key ---------------- Attack 1

.X key ---------------- Attack 2

.Down + Up keys ------- Super Jump

.A key ---------------- Call assist 1

.D key ---------------- Call assist 2

.S key ---------------- Hyper Combo

.A+S+D keys ----------- Crossover Combination
